item.title: JS (Jason) Liu
item.description: Hey! My name is JS (Jason) Liu, and I’m an environmental and development economics student and researcher. Currently, I work as a Junior Project Associate at the University of Chicago Energy & Environment Lab, a joint effort of Urban Labs and the Energy Policy Institute of Chicago (EPIC). I mostly work on research projects applying predictive analytics and randomized evaluation to inform policy on greenhouse gas emissions, PM air pollution, and hazardous waste management.
